title: AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, 4000A Peak 27800mAh Battery Jump Starter (for All Gas or Up to 10L Diesel), Battery Booster Power Pack, 12V Auto Jump Box with LED Light, USB Quick Charge 3.0, 4000A peak current, includes 88Wh portable battery charger
descriptions:
Meet the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter: the compact powerhouse that gets you back on the road in seconds. With a massive 4000A peak current and 27,800mAh (88Wh) capacity, it jump-starts all gas engines and diesel engines up to 10L—up to 40 times on a single charge. Perfect for cars, trucks, motorcycles, ATVs/UTVs, lawn mowers, and snowmobiles, this 12V auto jump box is your reliable, all-season rescue.

Why you’ll love it:
- Serious starting power: 4000A peak current tackles dead batteries with confidence—even in tough conditions.
- Fast, smart charging: USB Quick Charge 3.0 and a bidirectional Type-C port (input/output) recharge your devices up to 75% faster than ordinary power banks.
- Built-in safety: Intelligent protection guards against short circuit, reverse connection, low battery, and high temperature for worry-free use.
- Bright LED triple-mode light: Flashlight, SOS, and strobe for emergencies, night work, and roadside safety.
- Rugged and portable: Durable design with sturdy metal clamps, travel-friendly carry case, and enough juice to double as your everyday power bank.

What’s in the box:
- Portable Battery Starter
- Heavy-duty Jumper Cables
- USB-C Cable
- Cigarette Lighter Converter
- Carry Case
- User Manual

Peace of mind included: backed by a 24-hour online after-sales support team. Note: wall adapter not included.

Power through emergencies, charge on the go, and drive with confidence—choose the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter and be ready for anything.
